info.name: Lenta Dark (modified)
info.description:
Modified version of this dark Lenta.ru design:
https://userstyles.org/styles/98645/dark-lenta-ru-2014
info.additionalInfo:
1. Improved appearance
2. Fixed most white/bright spots
3. Removed AdFox section (because it is horribly BRIGHT sometimes and not automatically targeted by Adblock+).
